name: Password Generator
desc: A clean user interface to generate complex passwords. Choose up to four character options, and between 8 and 128 character length.

name: The Watchlist
desc: Search movies and add them to your watchlist. Shows where to watch, purchase or stream. Generates a map of local theaters if film is not yet released.

name: Memory Game
desc: A Witcher themed memory game. Objective is to click on all twelve images without repeating an image.

name: Code Quiz
desc: A simple code quiz. User answers questions quickly as time runs down. Correct answers score point, incorrect costs time. Enter a high score with initals.

name: To-Do List
desc: A to-do list created with React. Add notes, check them off to be strikethrough, click delete button to remove.

name: Employee Management System
desc: A command line interface to manage employee list. Add employees, role, department, and salary. Search, update, or remove from database.
